fields.name: ExceptionMessageDetail
fields.label: Exception Message Detail
fields.formulaExpression: case when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Starting position out of bounds') then 'Starting position out of bounds' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Exception thrown for auth token retrieval') then 'Exception thrown for auth token retrieval' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Aggregate query does not support queryMore') then 'Aggregate query does not support queryMore' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'CANNOT_INSERT_UPDATE_ACTIVATE_ENTITY') then 'CANNOT_INSERT_UPDATE_ACTIVATE_ENTITY' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'No file found') then 'No file found' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Implementation restriction') then 'Implementation restriction' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Unexpected character') then 'Unexpected character' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Apex Type unsupported in JSON') then 'Apex Type unsupported in JSON' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'MISSING_ARGUMENT') then 'Missing Argument' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'CPU time') then 'LimitException: Apex CPU Time Limit'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Apex heap size too large') then 'LimitException: Apex heap size too large'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'SOQL queries') then 'LimitException: Too many SOQL Queries'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many query rows') then 'LimitException: Too many query rows'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many query locator rows') then 'LimitException: Too many query locator rows'   when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many DML rows') then 'LimitException: Too many DML rows'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many DML statements') then 'LimitException: Too many DML statements'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many callouts') then 'LimitException: Too many callouts'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many queueable') then 'LimitException: Too many queueable jobs in queue'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many Email Invocations') then 'LimitException: Too many Email Invocations'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Too many future calls') then 'LimitException: Too many future calls'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Inactive User') then 'InactiveUserException: Inactive User'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'You do not have sufficient privileges to access the page') then 'ApexPagesHandledException: You do not have sufficient privileges to access the page'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'connection was cancelled here') then 'RunningForTooLongException: connection was cancelled here'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Dependent class is invalid and needs recompilation') then 'ParseExceptionWrapper: Dependent class is invalid and needs recompilation'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Method does not exist or incorrect signature') then 'ParseExceptionWrapper: Method does not exist or incorrect signature'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'SendEmail failed') then 'EmailExecutionException: SendEmail failed'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'General exception trying to send email from Apex') then 'EmailExecutionException: General exception trying to send email from Apex'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Record Currently Unavailable') then 'OracleRowLockedException: Record Currently Unavailable'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'ORA-30006: resource busy') then 'OracleRowLockedException: ORA-30006: resource busy'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'An error occurred while connecting to the external system') then 'DataSourceException: An error occurred while connecting to the external system'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'We encountered an error while querying the external data') then 'DataSourceException: We encountered an error while querying the external data'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'UNABLE_TO_LOCK_ROW') then 'DmlExecutionException: UNABLE_TO_LOCK_ROW'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'ENTITY_IS_LOCKED') then 'DmlExecutionException: ENTITY_IS_LOCKED'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS_OR_READONLY') then 'DmlExecutionException: INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS_OR_READONLY'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS_ON_CROSS_REFERENCE_ENTITY') then 'DmlExecutionException: INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS_ON_CROSS_REFERENCE_ENTITY'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'ENTITY_IS_DELETED') then 'DmlExecutionException: ENTITY_IS_DELETED'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'DELETE_FAILED') then 'DmlExecutionException: DELETE_FAILED'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INACTIVE_OWNER_OR_USER') then 'DmlExecutionException: INACTIVE_OWNER_OR_USER'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'REQUIRED_FIELD_MISSING') then 'DmlExecutionException: REQUIRED_FIELD_MISSING'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'FIELD_INTEGRITY_EXCEPTION') then 'DmlExecutionException: FIELD_INTEGRITY_EXCEPTION'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION') then 'DmlExecutionException: FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'FIELD_FILTER_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION') then 'DmlExecutionException: FIELD_FILTER_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INVALID_CROSS_REFERENCE_KEY') then 'DmlExecutionException: INVALID_CROSS_REFERENCE_KEY'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INVALID_FIELD_FOR_INSERT_UPDATE') then 'DmlExecutionException: INVALID_FIELD_FOR_INSERT_UPDATE'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INVALID_STATUS') then 'DmlExecutionException: INVALID_STATUS, You cannot update a version that is not the latest version of a document' when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'INVALID_OR_NULL_FOR_RESTRICTED_PICKLIST') then 'DmlExecutionException: INVALID_OR_NULL_FOR_RESTRICTED_PICKLIST'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'DUPLICATE_VALUE') then 'DmlExecutionException: DUPLICATE_VALUE'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'DUPLICATES_DETECTED') then 'DmlExecutionException: DUPLICATES_DETECTED'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'STORAGE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED') then 'DmlExecutionException: STORAGE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'STRING_TOO_LONG') then 'DmlExecutionException: STRING_TOO_LONG'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'requires a license to use') then 'LicenseException: Apex Class part of the AppExchange Package requires a license to use'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Flow email rate limited') then 'Flow email rate limited'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Future method cannot be called from a future or batch method') then 'Future method cannot be called from a future or batch method'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Attempt to de-reference') then 'Attempt to de-reference null object'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'List has no rows') then 'List has no rows for assignment to SObject'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Read timed out') then 'Read timed out'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'batchSize must not be null') then 'Null Batch Size'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'beforeUpdate') then 'BeforeUpdate Trigger'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'TEMPLATE_NOT_ACTIVE') then 'TEMPLATE_NOT_ACTIVE'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'AfterUpdate') then 'AfterUpdate Trigger'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'BeforeInsert') then 'BeforeInsert Trigger'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'AfterInsert') then 'AfterInsert Trigger'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'BeforeDelete') then 'BeforeDelete'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'failed to get force.com org details') then 'Authentication Error'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'No contact roles found for contract') then 'Missing contact roles'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'index out of bounds') then 'index out of bounds'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Permission to access') then 'Permission Denied'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'group membership operation already in progress') then 'Group Lock'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'SObject row was retrieved') then 'SOQL Field Error'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Invalid field') then 'Invalid field'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Can only throw this exception') then 'Exception Error'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Invalid Visualforce page parameter') then 'Invalid Parameter'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Quote to oppty sync failed') then 'Quote-Opp Sync Fail'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'unexpected token') then 'unexpected token'  when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'Batchable instance is too big') then 'Batch Size Error'  else 'Unknown' end

fields.name: ClassName
fields.label: Class Name
fields.formulaExpression:
case 
	when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",'\' for job id \'7') then substr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE", instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",': ')+3, instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",' for') - instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",': ')-4) 
	when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",' for job ID 7') then substr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE", instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",': ')+1, instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",' for') - instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",': ')-1) 
	when contains("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",') : \'') then coalesce(substr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1)+3,instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1,2)-(instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1)+5)),'Unknown') else coalesce(substr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1) + 1 , instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1,2)-instr("EXCEPTION_MESSAGE",':',1)-1),'Unknown') 
end

fields.name: ClassTriggerPage
fields.label: Class or Trigger or Page
fields.formulaExpression:
case 
    when contains("ENTRY_POINT",'batch') then "ENTRY_POINT" 
    when contains("ENTRY_POINT",' on ') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",1,instr("ENTRY_POINT",' ')) 
    when contains("ENTRY_POINT", 'VF- /apex/') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",11) 
    when contains("ENTRY_POINT", 'VFRemote-') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",11,instr(substr("ENTRY_POINT",11),' ')) 
    when contains("ENTRY_POINT",'.') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",1,instr("ENTRY_POINT",'.')-1)
    else ENTRY_POINT 
end

fields.name: Method
fields.label: Method
fields.formulaExpression:
case 
	when contains("ENTRY_POINT",'VFRemote-') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",instr("ENTRY_POINT",'(')+1,instr("ENTRY_POINT",')')-1)
	when contains(ENTRY_POINT, 'apex-//')  then substr("ENTRY_POINT",instr('ENTRY_POINT','$')+1) 
	when (contains("ENTRY_POINT",'.') AND substr("ENTRY_POINT",instr("ENTRY_POINT",'.')+1) != 'apexp') then substr("ENTRY_POINT",instr("ENTRY_POINT",'.')+1) 
	else null
end

fields.name: QuiddityLabel
fields.label: Quiddity
fields.formulaExpression: case when "QUIDDITY" = 'A' then 'ACS Batch Apex' when "QUIDDITY" = 'B' then 'Bulk API and Bulk API 2.0' when "QUIDDITY" = 'BA' then 'Start method of a Batch Apex job' when "QUIDDITY" = 'C' then 'Scheduled Apex' when "QUIDDITY" = 'CI' then 'Commerce Integration' when "QUIDDITY" = 'DL' then ' Discoverable Login page' when "QUIDDITY" = 'E' then 'Inbound Email Service' when "QUIDDITY" = 'F' then 'Future' when "QUIDDITY" = 'FC' then 'Function Callback' when "QUIDDITY" = 'H' then 'Apex REST' when "QUIDDITY" = 'I' then 'Invocable Action' when "QUIDDITY" = 'K' then 'Quick Action' when "QUIDDITY" = 'L' then 'Lightning' when "QUIDDITY" = 'M' then 'Remote Action' when "QUIDDITY" = 'P' then 'Batch Apex jobs running in parallel' when "QUIDDITY" = 'PI' then 'Post install script for a managed package' when "QUIDDITY" = 'Q' then 'Queueable' when "QUIDDITY" = 'QTXF' then 'Transaction Finalizer for Queueable' when "QUIDDITY" = 'R' then 'Synchronous uncategorized' when "QUIDDITY" = 'S' then 'QueryLocator Batch Apex' when "QUIDDITY" = 'TA' then 'Tests Async' when "QUIDDITY" = 'TD' then 'Tests Deployment' when "QUIDDITY" = 'TS' then 'Tests Synchronous' when "QUIDDITY" = 'V' then 'Visualforce' when "QUIDDITY" = 'W' then 'SOAP Webservices' when "QUIDDITY" = 'X' then 'Execute Anonymous' else 'Unknown' end

newProperties.label: Weighted lbs Carbon per CPU ms
newProperties.name: Weighted_lbs_Carbon_per_CPU_ms

OUTPUT1.label: ApexExecutionsWithExceptions
OUTPUT1.description: Apex Exceptions with a count of Exceptions

TRANSFORM3.label: CarbonCalculations
TRANSFORM3.description:
Grams done by Lbs*453.6

Kilograms done /2.205

Lbs done by ((RUN_TIME/1000000)*"Organization.CarbonData.Weighted_lbs_Carbon_per_CPU_ms")
